tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location_id INT NOT NULL,
  end_location_id INT NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_start FOREIGN KEY (start_location_id) REFERENCES delivery_locations(location_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_end FOREIGN KEY (end_location_id) REFERENCES delivery_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    start_location_id UUID REFERENCES delivery_locations(id),
    end_location_id UUID REFERENCES delivery_locations(id),
    distance DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE Routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    start_location_id INT,
    end_location_id INT,
    distance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (start_location_id) REFERENCES DeliveryLocations(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (end_location_id) REFERENCES DeliveryLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ShortestPaths (
    path_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    sequence_no INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES Routes(route_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES DeliveryLocations(location_id)
);
